text: Latvia uses constituencies () for elections to its national parliament, the Saeima, and for the European Parliament. ==Saeima constituencies== The Saeima has five multi-member constituencies. They are: * Courland * Latgallia * Livonia * Riga * Semigallia ==European Parliament== In the European Parliament, Latvia is represented by one multi-member constituency. ==References== Latvia
title: Constituencies of Latvia
